step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap and drag to select the effects paint tool.=Tap and drag to select the effects paint tool.
$$$/Tutorial/Select the Black & White effect.=Select the Black & White effect.
$$$/Tutorial/Reduce the brush size to about 30.=Reduce the brush size to about 30.
$$$/Tutorial/Paint everything but the horse to make the entire background black & white.=Paint everything but the horse to make the entire background black & white.
$$$/Tutorial/Now select the Saturation effect.=Now select the Saturation effect.
$$$/Tutorial/Increase the saturation to 100%. Tap OK.=Increase the saturation to 100%. Tap OK.
$$$/Tutorial/Paint only the horse with the saturation effect to enhance its color.=Paint only the horse with the saturation effect to enhance its color.
